title: Announce minutes instead of balance
description:
into DB table ivr_config 

INSERT INTO ivr_config (section, option, value, i_ivr_instance) VALUES ('callingcard', 'onlyminutesduration', 'true', 2);

i_ivr_instance - unique value, set as 2 or above


In CLD translation rule 'instanceX' word with corresponding digits must be inserted, e.g.

s/^/balance_earlymedia_cld/

turns into

s/^/balance_nobalance_earlymedia_instance2_cld/
description_text:
into DB table ivr_config 

 
 INSERT INTO ivr_config (section, option, value, i_ivr_instance) VALUES ('callingcard', 'onlyminutesduration', 'true', 2);

 
 
i_ivr_instance - unique value, set as 2 or above   
   
 
In CLD translation rule 'instanceX' word with corresponding digits must be inserted, e.g.  
 s/^/balance_earlymedia_cld/
 
 
  
turns into  
 s/^/balance_nobalance_earlymedia_instance2_cld/
